short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Building a screenshot taking extension and pass it to EveryQA defect

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Report visual bugs directly into your favourite tools, without leaving your website or web app.

Have you ever felt frustrated with internal testing and bug reporting, either as a reporter or as a developer? So did we, and we created EveryQA to streamline those workflows. 
Capture a screenshot of the visual bug, highlight, crop, fill in the form to create a defect in EveryQA... and continue browsing. You never leave your website.
